review: I really like the Amazon Fire TV.  The voice recognition is awesome.  I do wish there were more Prime movies and tv shows (free).  I was a bit disappointed at the selection.  I would still like to have CBS, NBC, etc available without an extra charge with the Amazon Prime.  All in all, still happy with my purchase.
